title: Covid-19 pandemic: Italy to shut shops and schools amid infection spike
content:
1. Covid-19 pandemic: Italy to shut shops and schools amid infection spike  BBC News
  2. Year after COVID hit Italy, 3rd wave of infections sending most of country into new lockdown  CBS News
  3. Italy to impose nationwide coronavirus lockdown over Easter weekend  Reuters
  4. Italian government approves strict new Covid measures as cases rise  The Guardian
  5. Most of Italy ordered under partial lockdown to stem new Covid-19 wave  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
